channel.title: Personalization on André Moraes
channel.description: Recent content in Personalization on André Moraes

item.title: Navigating the Personalization Landscape: A Case for Next.js Static Site Generation with Sitecore XM Cloud
item.description: Explore the power of Next.js Static Site Generation in a integration with Sitecore XM Cloud. Uncover the benefits of personalized user experiences while overcoming the challenges of server-side rendering.
